src:
Klasemen Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 dan Jadwal Timnas U-19
07 Nov 2019, 04:03 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Grup K Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 menuntaskan dua laga pada Rabu, 6 November, yang semuanya berlangsung di Stadion Madya Gelora Bung Karno, Jakarta.
Dalam laga perdana yang dimulai pukul 15.30 WIB, Korea Utara bermain imbang 1-1 dengan Hong Kong. Saat itu, Hong Kong unggul terlebih dahulu melalui penyerang Lau Ka Kiu (12’) sebelum disamakan pemain pengganti Korea Utara Ri Jo Guk (66’).
pada laga selanjutnya, mulai pukul 19.00 WIB, Timnas U-19 Indonesia tampil perkasa dengan menundukkan Timor Leste 3-1.
Muhammad Fajar Fathur Rachman membuat dua gol dalam laga itu (2’, 77’) dan satu gol lain disumbangkan bunuh diri kapten Timor Leste Gumario Moreira (62’). Timor Leste memperkecil kedudukan melalui sepakan penalti Mouzinho De Lima (51’).
Dengan hasil itu, Timnas U-19 Indonesia untuk sementara menduduki puncak klasemen Grup K dengan tiga poin. Korea Utara dan Hong Kong di urutan berikutnya dnega nilai 1. Timor Leste bertengger di posisi keempat atau juru kunci.
Dalam laga berikutnya, Indonesia akan menghadapi Hong Kong pada Jumat, 8 November 2019, di Stadion Madya Gelora Bung Karno, Jakarta. Pertandingan dimulai pukul 19.00 WIB dan disiarkan RCTI. Pada 15.30 WIB, akan berlangsung partai Timor Leste versus Korea Utara.
Hasil dan Jadwal selengkapnya
Rabu, 6 November 2019Korea Utara 1-1 Hong KongIndonesia 3-1 Timor Leste
Jumat, 8 November 201915:30 Timor Leste vs Korea Utara19:00 Hong Kong vs Indonesia (RCTI)
Ahad, 10 November 201915:30 Hong Kong vs Timor Leste19:00 Indonesia vs Korea Utara (RCTI).

text:
AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Standings and U-19 National Team Schedule
Nov 7 2019, 04:03 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Group K Qualification Cup AFC U-19 2020 completed two matches on Wednesday, November 6, all of which took place at the Bung Karno Madya Stadium, Jakarta.
In the inaugural match which began at 3:30 pm, North Korea drew 1-1 with Hong Kong. At that time, Hong Kong took the lead through attacking Lau Ka Kiu (12 ') before being matched by North Korean substitute Ri Jo Guk (66').
in the next fight, starting at 19.00 WIB, the Indonesian U-19 national team appeared mighty by beating Timor Leste 3-1.
Muhammad Fajar Fathur Rachman made two goals in the match (2 ', 77') and another goal was contributed by the suicide of East Timor captain Gumario Moreira (62 '). Timor Leste reduced their position through a penalty kick Mouzinho De Lima (51 ').
With that result, the Indonesian U-19 national team temporarily topped Group K with three points. North Korea and Hong Kong in the next rank with a value of 1. Timor Leste perched in fourth position or caretaker.
In the next fight, Indonesia will face Hong Kong on Friday, November 8, 2019, at the Bung Karno Madya Stadium, Jakarta. The match starts at 19.00 WIB and is broadcast by RCTI. At 3:30 pm West Indonesia Time, the East Timor party versus North Korea will take place.
Complete Results and Schedule
Wednesday, 6 November 2019 North Korea 1-1 Hong Kong Indonesia 3-1 East Timor
Friday, 8 November 201915: 30 East Timor vs North Korea19: 00 Hong Kong vs. Indonesia (RCTI)
Sunday, November 10, 201915: 30 Hong Kong vs. Timor Leste19: 00 Indonesia vs North Korea (RCTI).
